name: Decaf Irish Breakfast
description: Decaffeinated using the preferred CO2 method, this dark and rich tea will not disappoint. Well suited for milk and sugar.

name: Assam Organic
description: This is a full-bodied, robust, and malty tea that has excellent color in the liquor. The leaf is quite small and this adds to the strength of the cup. Our organics are grown without artificial fertilizers, pesticides and herbicides.Fair Trade

name: Irish Breakfast
description: A bold grade of tea with rich flavor, especially suited for those who like a hearty cup. Excellent with milk and sugar or lemon. Pure Assam tea from the Gingia Estate. A classic morning tea.

name: Golden Tippy Assam
description: A malty and self-drinking Assam. An Assam that can be had with or without milk. Lots of flavor and a wonderful sweet taste.

name: Masala Chai
description: A classic combination of Nilgiri black tea blended with cinnamon, cardamom, ginger, clove and black pepper. Traditionally served with steamed milk, sugar and/or honey. See also Chai Section.

name: Puttabong Estate Darjeeling
description: As good as it gets in Darjeeling teas, subtle cascading undertones-Exquisite.

name: Darjeeling 2nd Flush Makaibari
description: The Makaibari Estate has been producing only organic teas since 1992. A pleasing level of tannins with flowery notes. A fine Darjeeling either plain or with a splash of milk.

name: Pumpkin Spice Chai
description: Enjoy a taste of New England's fall season year round with one of Tealuxe's best sellers. An enticing chai blended with; black tea,cloves, ginger root, cardamom, cinnamon bark, natural pumpkin spice flavor, natural cinnamon flavor and marigold flowers

name: Decaf Highland Chai
description: A great decaffeinated chai that is a cross between our Kashmiri and Masala chais. A wonderful blend with the bold flavors of cardomom and cinnamon.

name: Throat Tender Organic
description: Is your throat raw, sore, chapped, in bad shape, etc. Try this sought after Organic Tealuxe elixer with cardamom for soothing and clearing nasal passages, cherry bark to suppress coughing, slippery elm to coat the throat and clove to numb that pain.

name: Tiger Hill Nilgiri
description: The word Nilgiri literally translated means Blue Mountains, and blue they are. One of the most spectacular mountain ranges of South India. Tiger Hill Estate is one of Nilgiri's best known gardens. Excellent flavor with a touch of mint.

name: Mango Mist Black Tea
description: Another superior Ceylon black tea with incredible taste from bits of mango added.

name: Ginseng Green Chai
description: A zesty blend of American ginseng, ginger, cardamom, pepper, and green tea. It is a natural tonic, low in caffeine, that invigorates the body and mind and while reducing stress. Also see Chai Section.

name: Kashmiri Chai  Organic
description: From Northern India, the predominant flavor in our Organic Kashmiri Chai is Cardamom. Peppermint, nutmeg, tellicherry pepper and black Indian teas balance out this exotic blend. Usually served with 1/3 steamed milk. Also see our Chai Section.

name: Tra Que Chai  Organic
description: The principal ingredient in this Organic Chai is cinnamon imported from Vietnam A blend of nutmeg, clove and black teas round out this brew. Usually served with 1/3 steamed milk. Also see Chai Section.

name: Spicy Chai  Organic
description: Our secret blend makes this Tealuxe Organic Chai a little spicy. Great with honey hot or iced. Also see Chai Section.

name: Keemun Supreme ""British Red Tea""
description: Keemun is the famous China ""Red"" tea. The small, tightly rolled, high-grade leaves yield a mighty rich brew.

name: Golden Monkey
description: Picked from plants dating back to the eighteenth century, this superb Keemun has a full, well-rounded body with a velvety character.

name: Kir Royale Mango,Apple,Black Currant,Cranberry,Hibiscus
description: A warm and sweet mixture of Mango,Apple,Black Currant,Cranberry and Hibiscus finsihed with a hint of Rum Flavor. Give yourself the royal treatment, the TEALUXE Kir Royale treatment.

name: Papaya & Pineapple (Hibiscus)
description: A light refreshing blend of tropical fruits including orange, pineapple and papaya. Scented with hibiscus flowers. A mild herbal with a gentle sweetness. Great iced as well as hot.

name: Lapsang Souchong Imperial Black tea
description: The Best China Lapsang Souchong we have found yet. Superior in flavor. Very smoky, yet quite mellow.

name: Victorian Rose Tea
description: China black tea prepared by hand in the traditional ôƒ¯®gou?thod. The tea is then naturally flavored by repeated layering with fragrant rose petals. The resulting tea is quite pleasant, smooth drinking and fragrant.

name: Tippy Yunnan
description: Yunnan teas have a slightly sweet, spicy and smokey character. This one is quintessential with a full body and golden tippy leaf.

name: Young Hyson
description: China green tea with a natural plum-like sweetness. Steep only about two minutes.

name: Organic Gunpowder Green Tea
description: A classic China green tea,subtle and delicate.gently rolled olive colored leaves makes our gunpowder a standout sensation.

name: Dragonwell (Lung Ching)
description: A superb grade of Dragonwell tea. One of the most popular grades of tea anywhere. Excellent aroma with a light body make this a desirable green tea.

name: Darjeeling Silvertips White Tea
description: Love tea? Try the most wonderful white tea we've found. White teas are even less processed than green teas, and this one is delicate, sweet and balanced.

name: White Peach Tea China
description: Rare White Tea from China infused with the taste of ripe Peaches. Smooth and Subtle. Try it hot or iced.

name: Decaf Green
description: A superior decaffeinated green tea from China. This natural decaffeinating process allows the leaves to retain shape and flavor.

name: Tropical White
description: Rare Fujian White Tea from China infused with pineapple and coconut. Try it hot or iced.

name: Decaf Green Mango
description: A superior decaf tea from China flavored with bits of mango. This decaffeinating process allows the leaves to retain their shape and flavor.

name: White Blueberry
description: Rare White Tea from the Fujian region flavored with sweet blueberries. A wonderfully smooth and subtle treat. Try it hot or iced.

name: White Tangerine
description: Rare White Tea from China with the sweet tangy flavor of tangerines. Try it hot or iced.

name: Royal Coconut Oolong Pouchong Tea
description: Like a sojourn in the South Pacific. Tealuxe's Royal Coconut is in the Oolong family of teas. Bold pouchong tea flavored with fresh coconut.This is a year round favorite of Tealuxe fans.

name: Decaf Apricot Arabesque
description: The ripening apricot harkens the end of summer with the essence added to a delicious decaffeinated black tea. Our Decaf Apricot Arabesque brews up sweet and smooth, with an aroma that captures summertime. Enjoy this tea brewed hot, or as a refreshing trea

name: Peachy White Black Tea
description: A Tealuxe favorite. Peachy White combines a China black tea base with the natural essence of white peaches. They are just as juicy and aromatic as their yellow sisters, but considerably more sensual and flavorful.

name: Pear & Pomegranate Black Tea
description: A blend of China black tea with natural fruit flavors and scents. Pomegranates with a tart but fresh taste and pears produce a sweet, light flavor. The two working together yield a truly singular effect. A sophisticated blend that can be enjoyed any time

name: Dragon Pearl Jasmine
description: An Extraordinary Jasmine Tea. Two leaves and a bud scented with the finest jasmine flowers and then tightly rolled into pearl sized balls. Tealuxe customers prize this tea.

name: Raspberry Green
description: The fresh flavor of raspberries infused with premium green tea from China.

name: Yin-Hao Special Grade Jasmine
description: The choicest of the standard grades of Jasmine tea. Delicate flavor with a natural sweetness that is enhanced by the subtle aroma of the finest Jasmine flowers.

name: Ti Quan Yin  Exotic Oolong
description: a.k.a. ""Iron Goddess of Mercy"" this exotic grade of Oolong is hand picked from the Wu-Yi tea bush. With a golden amber smooth body,and a nutty flavor, this is a true treat for the oolong lover. Brew traditionally or Gung Fu style.

name: Pu-erh Tuo Cha (puerh)
description: A compressed version of Pu-erh that tends to be slightly mellower than the loose leaf version. The raw Pu-erh leaves are compressed into a tiny ball and then slightly aged or oxidized. Each Tuo Cha weighs approx. 5 grams. Organic Fair Trade Certified. Al

name: Vanilla Green
description: Green tea from China with the smooth flavor of vanilla.

name: Oolong Traditional China
description: Tealuxe Oolong is especially popular with tea connoisseurs of southern China and Southeast Asia.

name: Pear & White Tea
description: A beautiful combination of white tea from China flavored with real pieces of pear.

name: Sencha Green Tea - High Grade
description: High grade Sencha is a grassy, brightly flavored tea. An unqualified pleasure to green tea drinkers. Like wine, the teas varies subtly from season to season.

name: Gyokuro
description: A must try for green tea enthusiasts. Literally translated ""Jewel Dew"" this full bodied tea offers unparalleled sweetness.

name: Pear & Green Tea
description: This blend is a wonderful marriage of light green tea and pear flavors. Great hot or iced.

name: Gen-Mai Cha
description: Bright, delicate Kyoto green tea mixed with toasted and popped rice. A visual treat like snow in the springtime. The roasty aroma is from the toasted rice. The flavor is mellow and unique.

name: Evergreen Estate Ceylon
description: A really good Ceylon. Harvested at peak time to assure the best quality and flavor. Alluring with a hint of vanilla-naturally.

name: Pu-erh Supreme (puerh)
description: A loose leaf Black tea from the Yunnan region of China. Has a dark color in the cup and a smooth earthy aroma and taste. Although classified as black teas,due to the dark steep color, pu-erh teas in actuality are closer to being fermented green teas.

name: Pu-erh Superior Grade (puerh)
description: A higher grade Pu-erh than our Supreme. The flavor of this tea is not subtle and is an exquisite example of the earthy flavored overtones associated with Pu-erh teas. Although classified as black teas,due to the dark steep color, pu-erh teas in actuality

name: Peach Apricot Cocktail
description: A melange of our customers' favorite flavors. You could call it ""Tealuxe customers' custom blend"".Featuring Black tea,papaya,peach,apricot,blackberry leaves & calendula petals

name: Monks Blend
description: Ceylon estate black tea and a mysterious combo of grenadine and vanilla makes this tea one of our most popular.

name: Caramel Creme Brulee Black Tea
description: Tealuxe's Ceylon Black Tea is flavored with an All Natural French Crï¿½me Brulee and a smooth caramel accent. It's Vegan,Dairy Free and contains no sugars or artificial sweeteners

name: Strawberry Sencha Green Tea
description: Rich Sencha leaves flavored with bits of strawberry. A delicious way to get to know green teas, but be careful, it's habit forming.

name: Green Tea Moroccan Mint
description: Gunpowder green tea blended with a generous amount of Moroccan spearmint.

name: Copley Vanilla Black Tea
description: A rich thick Vanilla flavored Black Ceylon Tea.Enjoy the warm welcome of creamy dreamy vanilla.

name: Chamomile
description: Also spelled chamomile. A soothing herbal tea without caffeine made from the herb manzanilla (sweet camomile). Ours is from Egyptian camomile, and only from the flowers. It has an intense apple aroma with a pleasantly bitter accent to the taste.

name: Yerba Mate
description: Also known as Argentinian tea. This mateine bearing plant is valued for its stimulating properties. We offer an excellent grade.

name: Mocha Mate
description: Our #202 Yerba Mate blended with roasted ramon nut and a hint of Mocha flavor. A rich tasting coffee alternative.

name: Dark Roast Yerba Mate
description: Our #202 Yerba Mate blended with the roasted ramon nut. Dark roasted for a stronger flavor.

name: Peppermint Mate
description: A blend of Yerba Mate and Peppermint will stimulate the mind and promote health and vitality.

name: Vanilla Nut Mate
description: Roasted ramon nut and vanilla gives this blend a smooth, sweet flavor.

name: Raspberry Earl Grey
description: A black tea with a subtle Earl Grey and more pronounced raspberry flavor. A Tealuxe favorite hot or iced.

name: Buckingham Palace Garden Party Tea Jasmine Earl Grey
description: Fit for a Queen ! Flavored with brightness and body. An excellent character is added with soft hints of Earl Grey and Jasmine. One of our most popular teas. Superb for afternoon tea settings.

name: Lady Londonderry
description: Princess Diana's favorite. A very interesting and flavorful tea with a hint of strawberry and lemons. Have a cup and you will see yourself lounging on the divan at the end of the day.

name: Lady Hannah Fruity Paradise
description: A delightful mix of whole fruits. Blackberries,apples,strawberries, raspberries,brambleberries,hibiscus,rosehip,papaya & pineapples create this taste sensation. Makes a very bold & bright cup with character. No caffeine.

name: Creme de la Earl Grey
description: Quintessential English style tea blended with blue flowers and a twist of cream. A fabulous tea.

name: Earl Grey Tea Harvard Square
description: China Black tea base with natural oil of bergamot. Produced for the British market, this tea has less bergamot than some American counterparts.

name: Blue Flower Earl Grey
description: A rare tea in the United States. Ceylon and Nilgiri teas are flavored with a special bergamot oil and sprinkled with Blue Mallow Blossoms. Earl Grey lovers, this tea will knock you out.

name: Extra Bergamot Earl Grey
description: Specially blended for those who prefer a heavily scented Earl Grey.

name: English Breakfast Tea Brattle Street Blend
description: A hearty blend of Ceylon and Assam teas, developed for us by a famous London company. Rich and flavorful, even with extra milk.Tealuxe's classic English Breakfast Tea popularized at our cafe on Brattle Street in Harvard Square.

name: Newbury Street Decaf English Breakfast
description: Decaffeinated using only pure Carbon Dioxide, leaving behind no residual chemicals. More costly than Ethyl Acetate but of superior quality. A whole leaf Ceylon OP. Enjoy with milk or plain.

name: Decaf Earl Grey ( Tealuxe's Charles Street)
description: Decaffeinated with the same process as our Newbury Decaf English Breakfast. A whole leaf Ceylon tea with the natural oil of bergamot oranges.

name: Orange Echinacea Tea  Organic
description: If you feel the beginnings of a cold of flu, this is the tea for you. With soothing natural orange and jasmine essence to nurse sinus troubles and runny noses and echinacea to battle back sickness and boost your immune system, you now have a powerful wea

name: Lavender Earl Grey
description: Tealuxe's Lavender Earl Grey is adorned with lovely lavender flowers which helps to soften the boldness of it's core bergamot flavor.

name: Chocolate Black Tea
description: Fine Sri Lanken Black Tea with decadent(Dairy Free)cocoa nibs and natural chocolate flavor.

name: Peppermint
description: Simply the best peppermint tea we've found. This herbal tea is bright and refreshing with a scent that rings strong and clear. Great brewed straight up or as part of a blend. Very good iced as well.

name: Lemongrass
description: Refreshing light lemony flavor, tastes great hot or cold. Believed to be an ancient digestive aid and to have anti-bacterial and anti-fungal properties.

name: Rooibos Red Bush
description: Tealuxe Rooibos Red Bush has an enchanting citrus flavor with a hint of vanilla and is a wonderful alternative to traditional black tea. It is a source of natural vitamin C and is completely caffeine free.

name: Spearmint
description: Like a brisk walk on a snow-covered trail, this 100% herbal spearmint leaf is quite refreshing.

name: Organic Orange Zephyr  (Licorice,Ginseng Cinnamon Ginger)
description: A magical blend of ginger and ginseng with natural orange and tangerine oils. It can be soft and sweet if you brew it for a short time,gets strong and spicy if brewed longer.

name: Sweet Chamomile Mint  Organic
description: A spectacular blend of classic Organic herbs Chamomile,Peppermint & Spearmint,highlighting the natural sweetness of Licorice Root. Its smooth and delicious flavor will satisfy both children and adults. Great hot or iced.

name: Unity Blend Organic
description: A smooth tasty blend of herbs and spices including organic lemongrass,organic ginger root,organic cardamom,organic black pepper, organic licorice root & organic peppermint producing a refreshing and energizing infusion.

name: Black Tea & Cherry
description: Real bits of cherries flavor this premium black tea from Ceylon.

name: Ginger Ginseng  Organic
description: A fantastic blend of Organic Black Pepper,Chamomile,Ginger Root,Ginseng,Licorice Root,Orange Peel,Peppermint,Rosehips & Spearmint. A healthful and delicious addition to any diet.

name: Turmeric Ginger Tea
description: Remarkably spicy Ayurvedic inspired concoction of ginger, exotic turmeric, orange peel, lemongrass and sweet licorice. Organic.

name: Chamomile Medley
description: This Chamomile citrus blend with a hint of mint, calms the mind and soothes the body. A perfect cup to relax or rock you to sleep.

name: Rote Grutze Red Berry Herbal
description: This wild herbal infusion contains natural vitamin C and is completely free of caffeine. Blended with rose hips and dried fruits. A knockout iced tea.

name: Strawberry Apple Hibiscus Herbal
description: Tealuxe's Strawberry Apple Herbal is blended with rose hips, hibiscus flowers, apple pieces, natural strawberry flavor, strawberries and raspberry leaves steep to a bold berry color. Delightfully aromatic and not too sweet for a caffeine-free treat.

name: Orange Rooibos
description: Organic Red Rooibos tea from South Africa with the flavor of juicy oranges.

name: Almond Rooibos
description: Red Rooibos Herbal Tea from South Africa married with natural almond flavor makes for a creamy, almost marzipan sweet yet delicate finish. Tealuxe's Almond Rooibos is great on its own and pairs well with dessert. Naturally caffeine free.

name: Vanilla Jasmine
description: A ""must have"". Start with the tastiness of good Ceylon vanilla tea and add sweet jasmine. The result: two flavors that were meant for each other.

name: Vanilla Rooibos
description: Organic Red Rooibos tea from South Africa with the smooth flavor of vanilla.

name: Mint Rooibos
description: An exciting blend of our own genuine Rooibos and Mint.

name: Organic Jamaica Red Bush Rooibos
description: Organic Fair Trade Certified Rooibos, Organic Fair Trade Certified Hibiscus,Organic Lemongrass,Organic Schizandra Berries,Organic rosehips,organic Licorice,Organic Orange Peel, Natural Passionfruit & Mango Flavors,Natural Essential oils of Orange,Tangerin

name: Organic Passion Fruit Rooibos
description: Organic Green Rooibos, Organic Osthmanthus, Lemon Myrtle, and Natural Fruit Flavors make a truly unique flavor that is good for any occassion.

name: Thayer St. Herbal Blend
description: A signature Tealuxe herbal blend designed at our Providence location joins African Red Rooibos with Peppermint,Chamomile, Ginger, and Ginseng.

name: Gingerbread Black Tea Ginger,Cinnamon,Orange
description: Ceylon Black tea flavored with bits of ginger, cinnamon, and orange.

name: Peach Rooibos
description: Organic Red Rooibos tea from South Africa with the invigorating flavor of peaches,
